name: YouPlot
description: A command line tool that draw plots on the terminal.
readme_summary: YouPlot is a command-line tool written in Ruby that generates various types of plots directly within the terminal. It leverages UnicodePlot to render visualizations from data piped into it, supporting formats like TSV and CSV.
key_features: Draws plots directly in the terminal
Supports bar, histogram, line, scatter, density, and box plots
Processes data from standard input (piped data)
Handles CSV and TSV data formats
Configurable plot dimensions and titles
Powered by UnicodePlot
primary_use_case: To quickly visualize data in the terminal without needing a graphical interface, making it useful for command-line workflows and data exploration.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, minimalist terminal window is open, displaying a vibrant, intricate line graph that appears to be growing out of a stream of flowing data. The data stream, represented by glowing digital particles, enters the terminal from the left and transforms into the colorful plot on the right. Subtle code snippets are visible on a small, secondary screen within the terminal interface. The overall mood is one of effortless data transformation and insight generation. The art style should be a clean, 3D isometric illustration with a dark background and neon-colored data visualizations, emphasizing the 'YouPlot' name subtly integrated into the terminal's design.

name: agentkit
description: AgentKit is a toolkit that gives AI agents access to crypto wallets and onchain functionality. Powered by the 0xGasless AgentKit SDK.
readme_summary: AgentKit is a TypeScript toolkit enabling AI agents to interact with blockchain networks and DeFi protocols. It facilitates gasless transactions and account abstraction on EVM chains, allowing agents to manage funds, trade tokens, and deploy smart contracts using natural language.
key_features: Framework-agnostic AI Agent primitives
Support for Python and Node.js
Gasless Transactions
Account Abstraction (ERC-4337)
Multi-Chain Support (BSC, Avalanche, Base, Sonic, Moonbeam)
Onchain Actions: Wallet details, token transfers/trading, contract deployment, DeFi interaction
primary_use_case: Building AI agents that can perform on-chain cryptocurrency transactions and interact with DeFi protocols without requiring users to hold native tokens for gas fees.
cover_image_prompt: A wise, friendly AI robot holding a magic wand, standing at a bustling digital marketplace. The robot is effortlessly directing streams of glowing cryptocurrency coins (represented by abstract digital particles) into various DeFi protocol interfaces (visualized as stylized, interactive stalls). Instead of traditional wallets, the robot uses a futuristic, ethereal energy source to power these transactions, symbolizing gasless operations. Small, holographic screens around the robot display simple transaction confirmations and wallet balances. The overall scene is vibrant and futuristic, with a clean, isometric 3D illustration style, emphasizing ease of use and the seamless integration of AI with decentralized finance.

name: waveterm
description: An open-source, cross-platform terminal for seamless workflows
readme_summary: Wave Terminal is an open-source, cross-platform terminal application that integrates traditional command-line functionality with graphical tools like file previews, web browsing, and AI assistance. It aims to keep developers within their terminal workflow while providing access to essential visual interfaces.
key_features: Flexible drag & drop interface for organizing terminal blocks, editors, web browsers, and AI assistants
Built-in editor for remote files with syntax highlighting
Rich file preview system for remote files (markdown, images, video, PDFs, CSVs, directories)
Quick full-screen toggle for any block
Wave AI - Context-aware terminal assistant
AI chat widget with support for multiple models
Command Blocks for isolating and monitoring commands
One-click remote connections with full terminal and file system access
Secure secret storage
Rich customization options
Powerful `wsh` command system for managing workspace and sharing data
Connected file management with `wsh file`
primary_use_case: To enhance developer productivity by integrating graphical tools and AI assistance directly into the terminal environment, reducing context switching.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan standing at a workbench, seamlessly weaving together threads of code, file icons, and browser windows into a cohesive tapestry. The artisan uses a magical loom where the threads represent different terminal commands and graphical elements. Input threads are raw code and data streams, while the output is a beautifully organized and functional digital workspace. Subtle glowing UI elements and data particles float around the loom, representing AI assistance and seamless integration. The scene is set in a clean, modern workshop with soft, focused lighting. The overall style is a 3D isometric illustration, emphasizing clarity and the interconnectedness of different tools within the Wave Terminal environment.
